title: intel parallel studio professional 2017.4 failing to install
body:
Hi all,
I was trying to install Intel parallel studio professional 2017.4, with spack and I am getting the following error:
```bash
==> Fetching file:///CEDAR/group/hpc/Software/intel-parallel-studio/intel-parallel-studio-professional.2017.4.tgz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Staging archive: /ROWAN/group/prod/LINUX_WORKSTATION/acs/spack/var/spack/stage/intel-parallel-studio-professional.2017.4-hgzj4lg3d3cfr5hy3s75x2t7vywqgwtf/parallel_studio_xe_2017_update4.tgz
==> Created stage in /ROWAN/group/prod/LINUX_WORKSTATION/acs/spack/var/spack/stage/intel-parallel-studio-professional.2017.4-hgzj4lg3d3cfr5hy3s75x2t7vywqgwtf
==> No patches needed for intel-parallel-studio
==> Building intel-parallel-studio [IntelPackage]
==> Found already existing license /ROWAN/group/prod/LINUX_WORKSTATION/acs/spack/etc/spack/licenses/intel/license.lic
==> Executing phase : 'configure'
==> Executing phase : 'install'
==> Error: IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/prod/acs/spack_prod/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-17.0.4/intel-parallel-studio-professional.2017.4-hgzj4lg3d3cfr5hy3s75x2t7vywqgwtf/../../../../../../../ROWAN/group/prod/LINUX_WORKSTATION/acs/spack_prod/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-17.0.4/intel-parallel-studio-professional.2017.4-hgzj4lg3d3cfr5hy3s75x2t7vywqgwtf/compilers_and_libraries_2017.4.196/linux/bin/intel64/icc.cfg'
/ROWAN/group/prod/LINUX_WORKSTATION/acs/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/intel-parallel-studio/package.py:415, in rpath_configuration:
     406      @run_after('install')
     407      def rpath_configuration(self):
     408          spec = self.spec
     409  
     410          if '+rpath' in spec:
     411              lib_dir = os.path.join(self.prefix, self.lib_dir)
     412              for compiler in ['icc', 'icpc', 'ifort']:
     413                  cfgfilename = os.path.join(
     414                      self.prefix, self.bin_dir, '{0}.cfg'.format(compiler))
  >> 415                  with open(cfgfilename, 'w') as f:
     416                      f.write('-Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker {0}\n'.format(lib_dir))

See build log for details:
  /local/cjn/.spack/var/spack/stage/spack-stage/spack-stage-NYw4d9/parallel_studio_xe_2017_update4/spack-build.out
```
output and env files are attached.
Any ideas anyone?

cheers,
Chris
(spack downloaded from git on 17th August)

[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/1245617/spack-build.out.txt)
[silent.cfg.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/1245616/silent.cfg.txt)
[spack-build.env.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/1245618/spack-build.env.txt)
